rules.name: Use multi-stage builds to slim images

shortDescription.text: Use multi-stage builds to slim images

fullDescription.text: Single-stage images bake dev tooling and artifacts into runtime images, increasing pull time and compute.

help.text:
Refactor to multi-stage; copy only runtime artifacts to final stage.

Detection: Dockerfile lacks multiple FROM stages; build tools present in final image.

KPI: image_size_mb
Estimated savings: -40–70% image size
help.markdown:
### Use multi-stage builds to slim images

**Rationale:** Single-stage images bake dev tooling and artifacts into runtime images, increasing pull time and compute.

**Detection:** Dockerfile lacks multiple FROM stages; build tools present in final image.

**Recommendation:** Refactor to multi-stage; copy only runtime artifacts to final stage.

**KPI:** image_size_mb

**Estimated savings:** -40–70% image size

**Tags:** Flow

rules.name: Switch to smaller base image (e.g., alpine, distroless)

shortDescription.text: Switch to smaller base image (e.g., alpine, distroless)

fullDescription.text: Large base images waste storage, bandwidth, and cold-start time.

help.text:
Use minimal base images when compatible; evaluate glibc/musl needs.

Detection: Base image in FROM is debian/ubuntu where alpine/distroless equivalent exists.

KPI: image_size_mb
Estimated savings: -20–60% image size
help.markdown:
### Switch to smaller base image (e.g., alpine, distroless)

**Rationale:** Large base images waste storage, bandwidth, and cold-start time.

**Detection:** Base image in FROM is debian/ubuntu where alpine/distroless equivalent exists.

**Recommendation:** Use minimal base images when compatible; evaluate glibc/musl needs.

**KPI:** image_size_mb

**Estimated savings:** -20–60% image size

**Tags:** Flow

fullDescription.text: Unnecessary build context increases build time and cache misses.

help.text:
Add .dockerignore with common excludes; confirm context reduction.

Detection: No .dockerignore or missing patterns for node_modules/.venv/tests/docs/.git.

KPI: build_context_mb
Estimated savings: -50–95% context
help.markdown:
### .dockerignore is missing or too permissive

**Rationale:** Unnecessary build context increases build time and cache misses.

**Detection:** No .dockerignore or missing patterns for node_modules/.venv/tests/docs/.git.

**Recommendation:** Add .dockerignore with common excludes; confirm context reduction.

**KPI:** build_context_mb

**Estimated savings:** -50–95% context

**Tags:** Flow,Feedback

fullDescription.text: Root containers require stronger isolation and hinder multitenant efficiency.

help.text:
Create non-root user and set USER; fix file ownerships.

Detection: USER not set or set to root in final stage.

KPI: non_root_percentage
Estimated savings: ≥95% workloads non-root
help.markdown:
### Do not run as root

**Rationale:** Root containers require stronger isolation and hinder multitenant efficiency.

**Detection:** USER not set or set to root in final stage.

**Recommendation:** Create non-root user and set USER; fix file ownerships.

**KPI:** non_root_percentage

**Estimated savings:** ≥95% workloads non-root

**Tags:** Governance

fullDescription.text: Excess layers/cache misses enlarge images and slow builds.

help.text:
Combine commands; use --no-cache; prune package caches.

Detection: Many small RUN steps; apt/apk caches not cleaned; no --no-cache.

KPI: build_time_sec
Estimated savings: -10–30% build time
help.markdown:
### Consolidate RUN layers & enable caching

**Rationale:** Excess layers/cache misses enlarge images and slow builds.

**Detection:** Many small RUN steps; apt/apk caches not cleaned; no --no-cache.

**Recommendation:** Combine commands; use --no-cache; prune package caches.

**KPI:** build_time_sec

**Estimated savings:** -10–30% build time

**Tags:** Flow

rules.name: Pin package versions for reproducible caching

shortDescription.text: Pin package versions for reproducible caching

fullDescription.text: Unpinned deps cause cache busts and inconsistent sizes.

help.text:
Pin versions and use lockfiles; periodic controlled bumps.

Detection: Package managers without pinned versions in Dockerfile.

KPI: cache_hit_rate
Estimated savings: ≥85% hit rate
help.markdown:
### Pin package versions for reproducible caching

**Rationale:** Unpinned deps cause cache busts and inconsistent sizes.

**Detection:** Package managers without pinned versions in Dockerfile.

**Recommendation:** Pin versions and use lockfiles; periodic controlled bumps.

**KPI:** cache_hit_rate

**Estimated savings:** ≥85% hit rate

**Tags:** Feedback

rules.name: Minimize layers with COPY --chown and targeted paths

shortDescription.text: Minimize layers with COPY --chown and targeted paths

fullDescription.text: Copying entire contexts inflates layers and rebuild scope.

help.text:
Copy only required directories; use --chown directly in COPY.

Detection: COPY . . patterns without .dockerignore; ownership fixes via separate RUN.

KPI: image_layers
Estimated savings: -10–25% layers
help.markdown:
### Minimize layers with COPY --chown and targeted paths

**Rationale:** Copying entire contexts inflates layers and rebuild scope.

**Detection:** COPY . . patterns without .dockerignore; ownership fixes via separate RUN.

**Recommendation:** Copy only required directories; use --chown directly in COPY.

**KPI:** image_layers

**Estimated savings:** -10–25% layers

**Tags:** Flow

rules.name: Remove dev dependencies from runtime image

shortDescription.text: Remove dev dependencies from runtime image

fullDescription.text: Dev deps add size and attack surface without runtime value.

help.text:
Use multi-stage or pip install --no-dev; npm ci --omit=dev for prod stage.

Detection: Node/Python build includes devDependencies/test tooling in final image.

KPI: image_size_mb
Estimated savings: -20–50% size
help.markdown:
### Remove dev dependencies from runtime image

**Rationale:** Dev deps add size and attack surface without runtime value.

**Detection:** Node/Python build includes devDependencies/test tooling in final image.

**Recommendation:** Use multi-stage or pip install --no-dev; npm ci --omit=dev for prod stage.

**KPI:** image_size_mb

**Estimated savings:** -20–50% size

**Tags:** Flow

fullDescription.text: Missing healthchecks harm scheduling efficiency and autoscaling responses.

help.text:
Add lightweight HEALTHCHECK with sensible intervals/timeouts.

Detection: No HEALTHCHECK in long-running services.

KPI: mean_time_to_recover
Estimated savings: -20–40% MTTR
help.markdown:
### Use HEALTHCHECK wisely

**Rationale:** Missing healthchecks harm scheduling efficiency and autoscaling responses.

**Detection:** No HEALTHCHECK in long-running services.

**Recommendation:** Add lightweight HEALTHCHECK with sensible intervals/timeouts.

**KPI:** mean_time_to_recover

**Estimated savings:** -20–40% MTTR

**Tags:** Feedback

rules.name: Prefer COPY over ADD (except for archives/URLs)

shortDescription.text: Prefer COPY over ADD (except for archives/URLs)

fullDescription.text: ADD has implicit behaviors that enlarge layers unexpectedly.

help.text:
Replace ADD with COPY; keep ADD for verified tar/URL needs.

Detection: ADD used for local files where COPY suffices.

KPI: image_layers
Estimated savings: -5–10% layers
help.markdown:
### Prefer COPY over ADD (except for archives/URLs)

**Rationale:** ADD has implicit behaviors that enlarge layers unexpectedly.

**Detection:** ADD used for local files where COPY suffices.

**Recommendation:** Replace ADD with COPY; keep ADD for verified tar/URL needs.

**KPI:** image_layers

**Estimated savings:** -5–10% layers

**Tags:** Flow

fullDescription.text: Missing/misaligned requests/limits cause overcommit waste or throttling.

help.text:
Set requests to p95 usage, limits ~1.5–2x; monitor and tune.

Detection: Containers without resources or with requests >> observed usage.

KPI: cpu_request_to_usage_ratio
Estimated savings: -20–50% CPU waste
help.markdown:
### Set CPU & memory requests/limits appropriately

**Rationale:** Missing/misaligned requests/limits cause overcommit waste or throttling.

**Detection:** Containers without resources or with requests >> observed usage.

**Recommendation:** Set requests to p95 usage, limits ~1.5–2x; monitor and tune.

**KPI:** cpu_request_to_usage_ratio

**Estimated savings:** -20–50% CPU waste

**Tags:** Flow,Feedback

fullDescription.text: Static replicas keep idle pods during low traffic.

help.text:
Add HPA based on CPU/RPS/custom metrics; verify scale-to-zero where safe.

Detection: No HPA present for scalable services.

KPI: avg_replica_hours
Estimated savings: -20–60% replica-hours
help.markdown:
### Enable Horizontal Pod Autoscaler (HPA)

**Rationale:** Static replicas keep idle pods during low traffic.

**Detection:** No HPA present for scalable services.

**Recommendation:** Add HPA based on CPU/RPS/custom metrics; verify scale-to-zero where safe.

**KPI:** avg_replica_hours

**Estimated savings:** -20–60% replica-hours

**Tags:** Flow

fullDescription.text: Excessive logs increase I/O, storage, and costs.

help.text:
Reduce verbosity; add log rotation/retention policies.

Detection: High log levels in production; long retention with no lifecycle.

KPI: log_bytes_per_day
Estimated savings: -30–70% logs
help.markdown:
### Right-size log verbosity & retention

**Rationale:** Excessive logs increase I/O, storage, and costs.

**Detection:** High log levels in production; long retention with no lifecycle.

**Recommendation:** Reduce verbosity; add log rotation/retention policies.

**KPI:** log_bytes_per_day

**Estimated savings:** -30–70% logs

**Tags:** Flow

rules.name: Use lean base images for sidecars

shortDescription.text: Use lean base images for sidecars

fullDescription.text: Sidecars often run 24/7; heavy images multiply waste.

help.text:
Switch to minimal images; consolidate sidecars where feasible.

Detection: Sidecars using generic heavy images.

KPI: image_size_mb
Estimated savings: -20–50% sidecar size
help.markdown:
### Use lean base images for sidecars

**Rationale:** Sidecars often run 24/7; heavy images multiply waste.

**Detection:** Sidecars using generic heavy images.

**Recommendation:** Switch to minimal images; consolidate sidecars where feasible.

**KPI:** image_size_mb

**Estimated savings:** -20–50% sidecar size

**Tags:** Flow

rules.name: Evict unused initContainers and probes tuned

shortDescription.text: Evict unused initContainers and probes tuned

fullDescription.text: Overly aggressive probes waste CPU/IO; unused initContainers add time.

help.text:
Tune probes; remove redundant initContainers.

Detection: Very short probe intervals/timeouts; initContainers doing one-off tasks repeatedly.

KPI: probe_cpu_seconds
Estimated savings: -10–25% CPU
help.markdown:
### Evict unused initContainers and probes tuned

**Rationale:** Overly aggressive probes waste CPU/IO; unused initContainers add time.

**Detection:** Very short probe intervals/timeouts; initContainers doing one-off tasks repeatedly.

**Recommendation:** Tune probes; remove redundant initContainers.

**KPI:** probe_cpu_seconds

**Estimated savings:** -10–25% CPU

**Tags:** Feedback

fullDescription.text: Poor bin-packing increases active nodes and cluster energy.

help.text:
Define affinity/anti-affinity to improve packing with SLOs.

Detection: No affinity/taints leading to spread across many nodes.

KPI: node_hours
Estimated savings: -10–30% node-hours
help.markdown:
### Node affinity/taints for efficient bin-packing

**Rationale:** Poor bin-packing increases active nodes and cluster energy.

**Detection:** No affinity/taints leading to spread across many nodes.

**Recommendation:** Define affinity/anti-affinity to improve packing with SLOs.

**KPI:** node_hours

**Estimated savings:** -10–30% node-hours

**Tags:** Flow

rules.name: Use gp3 (or latest) over gp2 for EBS

shortDescription.text: Use gp3 (or latest) over gp2 for EBS

fullDescription.text: Modern volumes provide better perf per watt and lower cost.

help.text:
Switch to gp3 with tuned throughput/IOPS.

Detection: AWS EBS volumes on gp2.

KPI: ebs_gb_month
Estimated savings: -10–20% cost/energy
help.markdown:
### Use gp3 (or latest) over gp2 for EBS

**Rationale:** Modern volumes provide better perf per watt and lower cost.

**Detection:** AWS EBS volumes on gp2.

**Recommendation:** Switch to gp3 with tuned throughput/IOPS.

**KPI:** ebs_gb_month

**Estimated savings:** -10–20% cost/energy

**Tags:** Flow

fullDescription.text: Cold data kept in standard tier wastes energy/cost.

help.text:
Add lifecycle rules; enable intelligent tiering where access is unpredictable.

Detection: S3 buckets without lifecycle or tiering.

KPI: s3_standard_gb
Estimated savings: -30–80% std GB
help.markdown:
### Enable S3 lifecycle & intelligent tiering

**Rationale:** Cold data kept in standard tier wastes energy/cost.

**Detection:** S3 buckets without lifecycle or tiering.

**Recommendation:** Add lifecycle rules; enable intelligent tiering where access is unpredictable.

**KPI:** s3_standard_gb

**Estimated savings:** -30–80% std GB

**Tags:** Flow

rules.name: Right-size instance types and autoscaling bounds

shortDescription.text: Right-size instance types and autoscaling bounds

fullDescription.text: Over-provisioned instances waste compute continuously.

help.text:
Use utilization metrics to set min/max; try smaller/arm/spot where safe.

Detection: ASG min/max too high; large instance families with low CPU.

KPI: vCPU_hours
Estimated savings: -20–50% vCPU-hrs
help.markdown:
### Right-size instance types and autoscaling bounds

**Rationale:** Over-provisioned instances waste compute continuously.

**Detection:** ASG min/max too high; large instance families with low CPU.

**Recommendation:** Use utilization metrics to set min/max; try smaller/arm/spot where safe.

**KPI:** vCPU_hours

**Estimated savings:** -20–50% vCPU-hrs

**Tags:** Flow

rules.name: Shorten log retention for CloudWatch/AKS/GKE logs

shortDescription.text: Shorten log retention for CloudWatch/AKS/GKE logs

fullDescription.text: Long retention multiplies storage footprint.

help.text:
Set retention to 7–30d per compliance; export cold logs to glacier.

Detection: Retention set to default (indefinite).

KPI: log_gb_month
Estimated savings: -20–60% log GB
help.markdown:
### Shorten log retention for CloudWatch/AKS/GKE logs

**Rationale:** Long retention multiplies storage footprint.

**Detection:** Retention set to default (indefinite).

**Recommendation:** Set retention to 7–30d per compliance; export cold logs to glacier.

**KPI:** log_gb_month

**Estimated savings:** -20–60% log GB

**Tags:** Flow

rules.name: Enable autoscaling on managed DBs and storage

shortDescription.text: Enable autoscaling on managed DBs and storage

fullDescription.text: Static allocations keep headroom always-on.

help.text:
Turn on autoscaling; monitor floor/ceiling.

Detection: RDS/CloudSQL without autoscaling or storage autoscale.

KPI: db_cpu_hours
Estimated savings: -15–40% CPU hrs
help.markdown:
### Enable autoscaling on managed DBs and storage

**Rationale:** Static allocations keep headroom always-on.

**Detection:** RDS/CloudSQL without autoscaling or storage autoscale.

**Recommendation:** Turn on autoscaling; monitor floor/ceiling.

**KPI:** db_cpu_hours

**Estimated savings:** -15–40% CPU hrs

**Tags:** Flow

fullDescription.text: Over-allocating memory wastes cost/energy; x86 vs ARM choice matters.

help.text:
Tune memory to p95 latency; switch to ARM/Graviton if libs allow.

Detection: Functions with large memory and low duration; x86 where ARM viable.

KPI: ms_per_invocation
Estimated savings: -10–40% ms
help.markdown:
### Right-size Lambda memory & architecture

**Rationale:** Over-allocating memory wastes cost/energy; x86 vs ARM choice matters.

**Detection:** Functions with large memory and low duration; x86 where ARM viable.

**Recommendation:** Tune memory to p95 latency; switch to ARM/Graviton if libs allow.

**KPI:** ms_per_invocation

**Estimated savings:** -10–40% ms

**Tags:** Flow,Feedback

fullDescription.text: Default S3 retention uses standard tier by default.

help.text:
Add transitions to IA/Glacier; delete incomplete MPU after N days.

Detection: Buckets without LifecycleConfiguration.

KPI: s3_standard_gb
Estimated savings: -30–80% std GB
help.markdown:
### Set S3 lifecycle transitions

**Rationale:** Default S3 retention uses standard tier by default.

**Detection:** Buckets without LifecycleConfiguration.

**Recommendation:** Add transitions to IA/Glacier; delete incomplete MPU after N days.

**KPI:** s3_standard_gb

**Estimated savings:** -30–80% std GB

**Tags:** Flow

fullDescription.text: Large bundles increase client energy and CDN egress.

help.text:
Code split, tree-shake, remove heavy libs, defer rarely used routes.

Detection: Detected bundle > budget (e.g., >250KB gzip).

KPI: bundle_size_kb_gzip
Estimated savings: -20–60% bundle
help.markdown:
### Bundle size budget exceeded

**Rationale:** Large bundles increase client energy and CDN egress.

**Detection:** Detected bundle > budget (e.g., >250KB gzip).

**Recommendation:** Code split, tree-shake, remove heavy libs, defer rarely used routes.

**KPI:** bundle_size_kb_gzip

**Estimated savings:** -20–60% bundle

**Tags:** Flow

fullDescription.text: Oversized raster images dominate transfer and decode energy.

help.text:
Use responsive srcset, modern formats, pre-sized images.

Detection: JPEG/PNG where WebP/AVIF possible; dims >> rendered size.

KPI: image_bytes
Estimated savings: -40–90% bytes
help.markdown:
### Unoptimized images (format/size)

**Rationale:** Oversized raster images dominate transfer and decode energy.

**Detection:** JPEG/PNG where WebP/AVIF possible; dims >> rendered size.

**Recommendation:** Use responsive srcset, modern formats, pre-sized images.

**KPI:** image_bytes

**Estimated savings:** -40–90% bytes

**Tags:** Flow

fullDescription.text: Dead weight in node_modules inflates bundles and builds.

help.text:
Prune deps; use targeted polyfills and browserslist.

Detection: Deps never imported; broad polyfills shipping to modern browsers.

KPI: bundle_modules_count
Estimated savings: -10–30% modules
help.markdown:
### Unused dependencies or polyfills

**Rationale:** Dead weight in node_modules inflates bundles and builds.

**Detection:** Deps never imported; broad polyfills shipping to modern browsers.

**Recommendation:** Prune deps; use targeted polyfills and browserslist.

**KPI:** bundle_modules_count

**Estimated savings:** -10–30% modules

**Tags:** Flow

fullDescription.text: Frequent polling wastes radio/CPU cycles.

help.text:
Switch to SSE/WebSockets/webhooks with backoff.

Detection: Intervals <30s for endpoints supporting SSE/webhooks.

KPI: poll_requests_per_hour
Estimated savings: -50–95% requests
help.markdown:
### Client polling where events/streams suffice

**Rationale:** Frequent polling wastes radio/CPU cycles.

**Detection:** Intervals <30s for endpoints supporting SSE/webhooks.

**Recommendation:** Switch to SSE/WebSockets/webhooks with backoff.

**KPI:** poll_requests_per_hour

**Estimated savings:** -50–95% requests

**Tags:** Flow

fullDescription.text: Console and verbose logging slow pages and leak info.

help.text:
Strip logs during build; guard by env.

Detection: console.debug/trace present in prod bundles.

KPI: console_calls_per_page
Estimated savings: -80–100%
help.markdown:
### Excessive console/debug in production

**Rationale:** Console and verbose logging slow pages and leak info.

**Detection:** console.debug/trace present in prod bundles.

**Recommendation:** Strip logs during build; guard by env.

**KPI:** console_calls_per_page

**Estimated savings:** -80–100%

**Tags:** Flow

fullDescription.text: Lack of caching increases repeat transfer energy.

help.text:
Add Cache-Control/ETag; content-hash filenames.

Detection: Static assets served without long-lived cache headers.

KPI: repeat_transfer_bytes
Estimated savings: -40–90%
help.markdown:
### No HTTP caching headers / immutability

**Rationale:** Lack of caching increases repeat transfer energy.

**Detection:** Static assets served without long-lived cache headers.

**Recommendation:** Add Cache-Control/ETag; content-hash filenames.

**KPI:** repeat_transfer_bytes

**Estimated savings:** -40–90%

**Tags:** Feedback

fullDescription.text: Python loops with repeated computation inflate CPU time.

help.text:
Hoist invariants; precompile regex; use comprehensions/vectorize.

Detection: Repeated regex compilation, function calls, or attribute lookups inside loops.

KPI: cpu_seconds
Estimated savings: -10–40% CPU
help.markdown:
### Inefficient loops / avoid repeated work

**Rationale:** Python loops with repeated computation inflate CPU time.

**Detection:** Repeated regex compilation, function calls, or attribute lookups inside loops.

**Recommendation:** Hoist invariants; precompile regex; use comprehensions/vectorize.

**KPI:** cpu_seconds

**Estimated savings:** -10–40% CPU

**Tags:** Flow

fullDescription.text: Chatty ORM access explodes DB calls and CPU/IO.

help.text:
Batch queries; use joins; ORM eager loading.

Detection: ORM calls in loops; missing select_related/prefetch_related.

KPI: db_queries_per_req
Estimated savings: -50–95% queries
help.markdown:
### N+1 DB query patterns

**Rationale:** Chatty ORM access explodes DB calls and CPU/IO.

**Detection:** ORM calls in loops; missing select_related/prefetch_related.

**Recommendation:** Batch queries; use joins; ORM eager loading.

**KPI:** db_queries_per_req

**Estimated savings:** -50–95% queries

**Tags:** Flow

rules.name: Inefficient JSON/CSV handling for large data

shortDescription.text: Inefficient JSON/CSV handling for large data

fullDescription.text: Loading whole files into memory increases time/energy.

help.text:
Use streaming/chunked reads; ijson; pandas chunksize.

Detection: json.load of large files; pandas without chunksize.

KPI: io_bytes
Estimated savings: -30–70% CPU/IO
help.markdown:
### Inefficient JSON/CSV handling for large data

**Rationale:** Loading whole files into memory increases time/energy.

**Detection:** json.load of large files; pandas without chunksize.

**Recommendation:** Use streaming/chunked reads; ijson; pandas chunksize.

**KPI:** io_bytes

**Estimated savings:** -30–70% CPU/IO

**Tags:** Flow

fullDescription.text: High precision math is slower and energy-costly when not needed.

help.text:
Use floats/NumPy dtypes appropriate to domain.

Detection: Decimal in hot paths without financial need; float64 where float32 OK.

KPI: cpu_seconds
Estimated savings: -5–20% CPU
help.markdown:
### Over-precision or unnecessary Decimal use

**Rationale:** High precision math is slower and energy-costly when not needed.

**Detection:** Decimal in hot paths without financial need; float64 where float32 OK.

**Recommendation:** Use floats/NumPy dtypes appropriate to domain.

**KPI:** cpu_seconds

**Estimated savings:** -5–20% CPU

**Tags:** Flow

fullDescription.text: Caches without bounds increase memory/GC and swap risk.

help.text:
Set maxsize; periodic pruning; use TTL caches.

Detection: lru_cache with no maxsize; dict caches never pruned.

KPI: peak_rss_mb
Estimated savings: -10–30% RAM
help.markdown:
### Unbounded caching / memory growth

**Rationale:** Caches without bounds increase memory/GC and swap risk.

**Detection:** lru_cache with no maxsize; dict caches never pruned.

**Recommendation:** Set maxsize; periodic pruning; use TTL caches.

**KPI:** peak_rss_mb

**Estimated savings:** -10–30% RAM

**Tags:** Flow

fullDescription.text: String formatting and IO in tight loops adds overhead.

help.text:
Use lazy logging; guard by level; batch logs.

Detection: f-strings evaluated before log level check; many debug logs.

KPI: cpu_seconds
Estimated savings: -5–15% CPU
help.markdown:
### Inefficient logging in hot paths

**Rationale:** String formatting and IO in tight loops adds overhead.

**Detection:** f-strings evaluated before log level check; many debug logs.

**Recommendation:** Use lazy logging; guard by level; batch logs.

**KPI:** cpu_seconds

**Estimated savings:** -5–15% CPU

**Tags:** Flow

rules.name: Redundant matrix jobs or duplicate workflows

shortDescription.text: Redundant matrix jobs or duplicate workflows

fullDescription.text: Unnecessary parallel jobs multiply CI compute.

help.text:
Deduplicate; conditional matrix; path filters.

Detection: Matrix includes identical environments; overlapping triggers.

KPI: ci_vcpu_minutes
Estimated savings: -20–50% minutes
help.markdown:
### Redundant matrix jobs or duplicate workflows

**Rationale:** Unnecessary parallel jobs multiply CI compute.

**Detection:** Matrix includes identical environments; overlapping triggers.

**Recommendation:** Deduplicate; conditional matrix; path filters.

**KPI:** ci_vcpu_minutes

**Estimated savings:** -20–50% minutes

**Tags:** Flow

fullDescription.text: Cold builds fetch and build deps every run.

help.text:
Add caching keyed by lockfile; cache Docker layers.

Detection: No actions/cache or equivalent; lockfiles ignored.

KPI: cache_hit_rate
Estimated savings: ≥85% hit rate
help.markdown:
### Missing dependency caching

**Rationale:** Cold builds fetch and build deps every run.

**Detection:** No actions/cache or equivalent; lockfiles ignored.

**Recommendation:** Add caching keyed by lockfile; cache Docker layers.

**KPI:** cache_hit_rate

**Estimated savings:** ≥85% hit rate

**Tags:** Feedback

fullDescription.text: Long-lived artifacts consume storage.

help.text:
Reduce retention; compress artifacts; avoid large artifacts.

Detection: Artifacts kept >14 days without need.

KPI: artifact_gb_month
Estimated savings: -30–80% GB
help.markdown:
### Artifact retention too long

**Rationale:** Long-lived artifacts consume storage.

**Detection:** Artifacts kept >14 days without need.

**Recommendation:** Reduce retention; compress artifacts; avoid large artifacts.

**KPI:** artifact_gb_month

**Estimated savings:** -30–80% GB

**Tags:** Flow

fullDescription.text: Running all tests on every change wastes compute.

help.text:
Adopt test impact analysis or path filters; split smoke vs full.

Detection: No path-based test selection; no impacted tests.

KPI: ci_vcpu_minutes
Estimated savings: -20–60% minutes
help.markdown:
### Run tests selectively (changed paths)

**Rationale:** Running all tests on every change wastes compute.

**Detection:** No path-based test selection; no impacted tests.

**Recommendation:** Adopt test impact analysis or path filters; split smoke vs full.

**KPI:** ci_vcpu_minutes

**Estimated savings:** -20–60% minutes

**Tags:** Flow

fullDescription.text: Duplicate assets inflate bundles and storage.

help.text:
Deduplicate; reference single copy; use asset pipeline.

Detection: Hash-colliding assets in repo or build output.

KPI: asset_bytes
Estimated savings: -10–30% bytes
help.markdown:
### Deduplicate identical images/fonts

**Rationale:** Duplicate assets inflate bundles and storage.

**Detection:** Hash-colliding assets in repo or build output.

**Recommendation:** Deduplicate; reference single copy; use asset pipeline.

**KPI:** asset_bytes

**Estimated savings:** -10–30% bytes

**Tags:** Flow

fullDescription.text: Full font families add 100s of KB per page.

help.text:
Subset to needed glyphs; use WOFF2; preload wisely.

Detection: Multiple full fonts loaded; no unicode-range subsetting.

KPI: font_bytes
Estimated savings: -40–80% bytes
help.markdown:
### Subsetting & compressing web fonts

**Rationale:** Full font families add 100s of KB per page.

**Detection:** Multiple full fonts loaded; no unicode-range subsetting.

**Recommendation:** Subset to needed glyphs; use WOFF2; preload wisely.

**KPI:** font_bytes

**Estimated savings:** -40–80% bytes

**Tags:** Flow

rules.name: Video autoplay or high bitrate by default

shortDescription.text: Video autoplay or high bitrate by default

fullDescription.text: Autoplay and high bitrate waste client energy/data.

help.text:
Disable autoplay; use ABR; reduce default resolution.

Detection: Autoplay enabled; >1080p on mobile; no adaptive bitrate.

KPI: video_bytes
Estimated savings: -30–70% bytes
help.markdown:
### Video autoplay or high bitrate by default

**Rationale:** Autoplay and high bitrate waste client energy/data.

**Detection:** Autoplay enabled; >1080p on mobile; no adaptive bitrate.

**Recommendation:** Disable autoplay; use ABR; reduce default resolution.

**KPI:** video_bytes

**Estimated savings:** -30–70% bytes

**Tags:** Flow

fullDescription.text: Table scans increase CPU/IO and latency.

help.text:
Add composite indexes; verify via EXPLAIN/ANALYZE.

Detection: Slow query patterns lacking supporting indexes.

KPI: cpu_seconds_per_query
Estimated savings: -30–90% CPU
help.markdown:
### Indexes missing on hot queries

**Rationale:** Table scans increase CPU/IO and latency.

**Detection:** Slow query patterns lacking supporting indexes.

**Recommendation:** Add composite indexes; verify via EXPLAIN/ANALYZE.

**KPI:** cpu_seconds_per_query

**Estimated savings:** -30–90% CPU

**Tags:** Flow

fullDescription.text: Old rows and blobs increase storage/backup energy.

help.text:
Add retention; tier cold data; purge safely.

Detection: Tables without TTL/archival policy; ever-growing blobs.

KPI: storage_gb_month
Estimated savings: -20–60% GB
help.markdown:
### Excessive data retention without policy

**Rationale:** Old rows and blobs increase storage/backup energy.

**Detection:** Tables without TTL/archival policy; ever-growing blobs.

**Recommendation:** Add retention; tier cold data; purge safely.

**KPI:** storage_gb_month

**Estimated savings:** -20–60% GB

**Tags:** Flow

rules.name: Inefficient serialization (JSON blobs for hot paths)

shortDescription.text: Inefficient serialization (JSON blobs for hot paths)

fullDescription.text: JSON blobs force parse/scan vs structured columns.

help.text:
Normalize columns or add generated columns with indexes.

Detection: Frequent JSON_EXTRACT on hot path fields.

KPI: cpu_seconds_per_query
Estimated savings: -10–40% CPU
help.markdown:
### Inefficient serialization (JSON blobs for hot paths)

**Rationale:** JSON blobs force parse/scan vs structured columns.

**Detection:** Frequent JSON_EXTRACT on hot path fields.

**Recommendation:** Normalize columns or add generated columns with indexes.

**KPI:** cpu_seconds_per_query

**Estimated savings:** -10–40% CPU

**Tags:** Flow

fullDescription.text: Without baselines, improvements aren’t measured or celebrated.

help.text:
Capture baseline on first run; compare on PRs and sprints.

Detection: Missing .eco-audit baseline files.

KPI: improvement_rate
Estimated savings: ≥20% reduction in 60 days
help.markdown:
### No baseline/delta tracking enabled

**Rationale:** Without baselines, improvements aren’t measured or celebrated.

**Detection:** Missing .eco-audit baseline files.

**Recommendation:** Capture baseline on first run; compare on PRs and sprints.

**KPI:** improvement_rate

**Estimated savings:** ≥20% reduction in 60 days

**Tags:** Learning

fullDescription.text: Lack of repeatable fixes slows adoption and learning.

help.text:
Author concise playbooks; link from SARIF help.

Detection: Rules without documented fix steps/playbooks.

KPI: time_to_fix_days
Estimated savings: -20–40% TTF
help.markdown:
### Missing playbooks linked from rules

**Rationale:** Lack of repeatable fixes slows adoption and learning.

**Detection:** Rules without documented fix steps/playbooks.

**Recommendation:** Author concise playbooks; link from SARIF help.

**KPI:** time_to_fix_days

**Estimated savings:** -20–40% TTF

**Tags:** Learning
